No Pollution: This button should reset noise pollution
Allow noise pollution or not (checked means pollution is active)
Allow net (road) pollution not (checked means pollution is active)
Allow buildingadd pollution  (checked means pollution is active and required for most other pollution types)
Allow ground pollution or (checked means pollution is active and when unchecked will remove existing pollution)
Allow water pollution or not (Checked means pollution is active)
Allow waterpipe pollution or not (checked means pollution is active)
Allow air pollution or not (checked means pollution is active and when unchecked will remove existing pollution)
